A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some beautifully shot scenes and while this is a good film it is one of the worst Star Wars films ever made. Luke's story is a travesty. Flying Leia is ridiculous and just unacceptable. The use of the force is confounding. It also felt a little paint by numbers - insert love story here\, insert action scene here. My half star goes to Adam Driver for his wonderful full performance. The cast did the best they could with a storyline which is basically a big f you to the Star Wars loving audience. Thanks Disney.
